content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: STUDYID
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $dm_studyid
Core:
  Id: CORE-000172
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when STUDYID is not equal to DM.STUDYID
Operations:
  - domain: DM
    id: $dm_studyid
    name: STUDYID
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: STUDYID is not equal to DM.STUDYID
  Output Variables:
    - STUDYID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0409
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: All records with the same STUDYID value are a group
                  of records that describe that study.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: 2.B.1
                Section: 4.2.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when STUDYID is not equal to DM.STUDYID

Outcome.Message: STUDYID is not equal to DM.STUDYID

Citations.Cited_Guidance: All records with the same STUDYID value are a group of records that describe that study.
